description: Explore a Supabase database: list tables, examine schema, query data

steps.prompt: List all tables in the public schema to see what data is available.
Now get the schema details for the tables by querying information_schema.columns. Show columns for the first few tables.
Query a sample of data from one of the tables to understand its structure. Select the first 20 rows.
Based on what you've learned about the database, provide a brief summary of the database structure and what kind of data it contains.

description: Check Supabase project health: get URL, check logs, review advisors

steps.prompt: Get the project URL to verify the project is accessible.
Check the recent API logs for any errors or issues.
Get advisor recommendations to check for security or performance issues.
Based on the URL, logs, and advisors, provide a health summary of the Supabase project.

description: Analyze Cloudflare Workers: list workers, check observability data

steps.prompt: List all Cloudflare Workers in the account.
Get the available observability keys to understand what metrics are available.
Query recent worker observability events to check for errors or performance issues.
Based on the workers list and observability data, provide a summary of the Workers deployment health.
List all migrations that have been applied to the database.
List all extensions installed in the database.
List all tables to see the current schema state.
Summarize the database migration history and current state.
